H0.text: Which film, directed by David Lean and starring John Mills, opens with an escaped convict grabbing hold of a boy in a graveyard. Great Expectations

H1.text: Which film, directed by David Lean and starring John Mills, opens with an escaped convict grabbing hold of a boy in a graveyard. Oliver Twist

H2.text: Which film, directed by David Lean and starring John Mills, opens with an escaped convict grabbing hold of a boy in a graveyard. The Inn of the Sixth Happiness

H3.text: Which film, directed by David Lean and starring John Mills, opens with an escaped convict grabbing hold of a boy in a graveyard. Jaggers

A4.text: The film's plot begins with orphan Pip encountering an escaped convict, Abel Magwitch, in a graveyard.

A5.text: Great Expectations is a 1946 British drama film directed by David Lean and starring John Mills.
